items: Launched the 'Premium Prompts' page, showcasing curated content with detailed drawer browsing support.
Redesigned the drawer's close interaction and visual hierarchy for more prominent buttons and clearer operation feedback.
Enhanced search box with fuzzy matching and loading indicators to improve public prompt filtering efficiency.
Added a 'Copy Full Text' button for one-click copying of prompt content, boosting reuse efficiency.
summary: Release v1.2.0: Introducing the Premium Prompts page with comprehensive UI and search flow optimizations
title: v1.2.0 Public Prompt Experience Upgrade

items: 上线“优质 Prompt”页面，集中展示精选内容并支持详情抽屉浏览。
重做详情抽屉的关闭交互与视觉层次，按钮更显眼、操作反馈更清晰。
搜索框加入模糊匹配与加载提示，提升筛选公共 Prompt 的效率。
新增“复制全文”按钮，一键复制 Prompt 正文提升复用效率。
summary: 发布 v1.2.0，新增优质 Prompt 页面并全面优化 UI 与搜索流程
title: v1.2.0 公共 Prompt 体验升级

items: Added POST /api/prompts/export endpoint to export current account's Prompts as local JSON files, with support for custom storage directory via PROMPT_EXPORT_DIR.
"My Prompts" page now features an "Export Prompt" button, displaying local file path and timestamp after export for quick offline archive location.
Launched Prompt details page, supporting navigation from list to view content, keywords, tags, and one-click return to workspace for continued editing.
Added offline mode
summary: Support offline export of Prompts and viewing complete details
title: Prompt Export and Details Page Enhancement

items: 新增 POST /api/prompts/export 接口，可将当前账号的 Prompt 导出为本地 JSON 文件，并支持通过 PROMPT_EXPORT_DIR 自定义存放目录。
“我的 Prompt” 页面新增“导出 Prompt”按钮，导出完成后会展示本地文件路径和时间，方便离线模式快速定位存档。
上线 Prompt 详情页，支持从列表跳转查看正文、关键词、标签等信息，并可一键返回工作台继续编辑。
添加离线模式
summary: 支持离线导出 Prompt 并查看完整详情信息
title: Prompt 导出与详情页增强

items: Generated session-unique drag-and-drop IDs for workspace keywords to prevent conflicts between positive and negative list IDs.
Only returned actual keywordId upon submission to eliminate duplicate rendering and sorting errors.
summary: Resolved the issue where keywords always dragged to the first position after draft backfilling and could not be sorted across columns.
title: Fixed Prompt Workspace Keyword Drag-and-Drop Anomaly

items: 为工作台关键词生成会话级唯一拖拽 ID，避免正负向列表 ID 冲突。
提交时仅回传真实 keywordId，消除重复渲染与排序错误。
summary: 解决草稿回填后关键词总是拖动首项、无法跨列排序的问题。
title: 修复 Prompt 工作台关键词拖拽异常

items: Electron rendering window is fixed at 1100×720 with drag-to-zoom disabled, ensuring visual stability on desktop; window control buttons are automatically hidden in web preview.
Added VITE_KEYWORD_ROW_LIMIT and VITE_DEFAULT_KEYWORD_WEIGHT environment variables, defaulting to display 3 keywords with an initial weight value of 5.
In the Prompt workspace, the requirement and label areas are rearranged vertically, and the 'Add Label' button is widened to prevent line breaks on small screens.
summary: Fixed Electron shell proportions and optimized keyword editing experience.
title: Desktop Window and Workspace Experience Adjustments

items: Electron 渲染窗口固定为 1100×720，并禁用拖拽缩放，确保桌面端视觉稳定；网页预览自动隐藏窗口控制按钮。
新增 VITE_KEYWORD_ROW_LIMIT 与 VITE_DEFAULT_KEYWORD_WEIGHT 环境变量，默认展示 3 个关键词并保留权重 5 的初始值。
Prompt 工作台中补充要求与标签区域改为上下排列，并拉宽“添加标签”按钮，避免小屏布局换行。
summary: 固化 Electron 外壳比例并优化关键词编辑体验。
title: 桌面端窗口与工作台体验调整

items: Added tag input and deletion controls in the workbench right sidebar, supporting deduplication, limit reminders, and shortcut submission
Backend uniformly cleans tags and writes to MySQL when saving prompts, while synchronizing to Redis workspace attributes
Tags are automatically repopulated when restoring drafts from Redis or asynchronous persistence queues to prevent data drift
Added `PROMPT_TAG_LIMIT` / `VITE_PROMPT_TAG_LIMIT` configuration items to constrain tag quantity via environment variables
summary: Prompt Workbench introduces a new tag editor with unified backend validation and persistence rules.
title: Tag Management and Persistence Optimization

items: 工作台右栏新增标签输入与删除控件，支持去重、上限提醒与快捷键提交
保存 Prompt 时后端统一清洗标签并写入 MySQL，同时同步到 Redis 工作区 attributes
从 Redis 恢复草稿或异步持久化队列时会自动回填标签，防止数据漂移
新增 `PROMPT_TAG_LIMIT` / `VITE_PROMPT_TAG_LIMIT` 配置项，以环境变量方式约束标签数量
summary: Prompt 工作台新增标签编辑器，并在后端统一校验与持久化规则。
title: 标签管理与持久化优化

items: Added PROMPT_KEYWORD_MAX_LENGTH / PROMPT_TAG_MAX_LENGTH configurations, automatically truncating and deduplicating upon save
Both manual entries and AI-generated content in the Workbench display ...(+N) prompts, with Toast notifications for excessive length
"My Prompts" list and the Workbench's right-side tags maintain consistent abbreviated display
summary: Limit character count for keywords and tags with overflow prompts to prevent display issues in lists.
title: New Length Constraints for Keywords and Tags

items: 新增 PROMPT_KEYWORD_MAX_LENGTH / PROMPT_TAG_MAX_LENGTH 配置，保存时自动截断并去重
Workbench 手动录入与 AI 产出都显示 …(+N) 提示，超长会 Toast 提示
“我的 Prompt” 列表与工作台右侧标签保持同样的缩略显示
summary: 限制关键词、标签字符数并提供超长提示，避免列表显示溢出。
title: 关键词与标签新增长度约束

items: Opened /api/ip-guard/bans management interface, allowing administrators to query ban lists and call DELETE /api/ip-guard/bans/:ip to lift bans.
Supported IP_GUARD_ADMIN_SCAN_COUNT and IP_GUARD_ADMIN_MAX_ENTRIES environment variables to configure scan batch size and return limits, avoiding hardcoding.
Supplemented Redis verification code/rate limiting related environment variable descriptions for convenient adjustment of windows and thresholds as needed.
summary: Added IP Guard management interface and organized verification code rate limiting environment variables for dynamic control.
title: IPv4 Blacklist and Redis Rate Limiting Configuration

items: 开放 /api/ip-guard/bans 管理接口，管理员可查询封禁列表并调用 DELETE /api/ip-guard/bans/:ip 解除封禁。
支持 IP_GUARD_ADMIN_SCAN_COUNT、IP_GUARD_ADMIN_MAX_ENTRIES 环境变量配置扫描批量与返回上限，避免硬编码。
补充 Redis 验证码/限流相关环境变量说明，方便按需调整窗口与阈值。
summary: 新增 IP Guard 管理接口并梳理验证码限流环境变量，便于动态管控。
title: IPv4 黑名单与 Redis 限流配置

items: Loading Toast pops up at the start of parsing descriptions, AI keyword completion, and Prompt generation, automatically closing upon completion or failure, allowing users to track progress in real-time.
Added 'No inspiration? Try AI keyword completion' prompt with accompanying button in the manual keyword addition area for quick access to completion capabilities.
Added relevant i18n copy and updated README to document interaction changes.
summary: Added Toast progress bar prompts for parsing, keyword completion, and generation workflows to enhance waiting experience.
title: Long-Running Operation Prompt Optimization

items: 解析描述、AI 补词、Prompt 生成在开始时弹出 loading Toast，完成或失败后自动关闭，用户能实时掌握进度。
关键词手动添加区域补充“没有灵感？试试让 AI 补充关键词”提示并配套按钮，方便快速唤起补词能力。
新增相关 i18n 文案并更新 README 记录交互变化。
summary: 解析、补词与生成流程新增 Toast 进度条提示，提升等待体验。
title: 长耗时操作提示优化

items: The workspace is now split into three columns: the panel after requirement analysis directly provides manual addition and 'AI-supplemented keywords', with positive/negative keyword pools in separate columns for a clearer layout.
Added a 'Sort by Weight' button to the positive/negative keyword header row, always aligned at the end for easy weight organization.

Drag-and-drop now displays an insertion position indicator and elevates item z-index, preventing obstruction during cross-column moves; sync via /api/prompts/keywords/sync only triggers on actual sorting or weight changes.
summary: Redesigned keyword governance layout and enhanced visual feedback for drag-and-drop sorting.
title: Keyword Workspace Interaction Upgrade

items: 工作台拆分为三列：需求解析后的面板直接提供手动添加与“AI 补充关键词”，正/负向关键词池单独成列，布局更清晰。
正负向关键词标题行新增“按权重排序”按钮，始终对齐在行尾，便于随手整理权重。
拖拽时提供插入位置指示条并提升条目 z-index，跨列移动时不再遮挡；仅在真实排序或权重变化时才触发 /api/prompts/keywords/sync。
summary: 重构关键词治理布局并强化拖拽排序的可视反馈。
title: 关键词工作台交互升级

items: Direct manual addition and 'AI Keyword Supplement' guidance provided below requirement analysis, with only positive/negative keyword lists retained in the middle column and sort buttons fixed at row ends.
Insertion indicator bar displayed during drag-and-drop with increased item z-index, syncing to /api/prompts/keywords/sync only upon detecting actual changes.
Added loading Toast for description analysis, AI keyword supplementation, and Prompt generation to centrally indicate progress; 'No inspiration' prompt text appended to the keyword supplement panel.
summary: Refactored keyword governance layout and enhanced drag-and-drop feedback, with new Toast progress indicators for long-running operations.
title: Keyword Workspace and Interaction Detail Optimization

items: 需求解析下方直接提供手动添加与“AI 补充关键词”引导，中列仅保留正/负关键词列表，排序按钮固定在行尾。
拖拽时显示插入指示条并提高条目 z-index，仅在检测到实际变动时同步 /api/prompts/keywords/sync。
解析描述、AI 补词、Prompt 生成新增 loading Toast，集中提示进度；补词面板附加“无灵感”提示文案。
summary: 重构关键词治理布局并强化拖拽反馈，长耗时操作新增 Toast 进度提示。
title: 关键词工作台与交互细节优化

items: The input field supports automatic recognition of email or username, with backend matching in order.
Added a 'Remember this account' checkbox, saved in browser localStorage.
Automatically fills in the account after successful login; records are not retained when unchecked.
Sidebar adjustment: Placed 'Update Log' before 'Settings'.
summary: The login form now allows using email or username, and provides an option to remember the account.
title: Support for Username Login and Remember Account

items: 输入框支持自动识别邮箱或用户名，后端按顺序匹配。
新增“记住此账号”复选框，保存在浏览器 localStorage 中。
登录成功后自动回填账号；未勾选时不会保留记录。
侧边栏调整：将“更新日志”放在“设置”之前。
summary: 登录表单现在允许使用邮箱或用户名，并提供记住账号选项。
title: 支持用户名登录与记住账号

items: Administrators select 'Auto-translate' on the frontend and submit.
The backend calls DeepSeek to translate the content into English and stores it in the database.
The English version is displayed alongside the original Chinese entry.
summary: Verify that the automatic translation feature is functioning correctly.
title: Translation Test Log

items: 管理员在前端勾选“自动翻译”后提交。
后端调用 DeepSeek 将内容翻译成英文并一同入库。
英文版会与原始中文条目同时展示。
summary: 验证自动翻译功能是否正常工作。
title: 翻译测试日志

items: 新增受 JWT 管理员权限保护的 /api/changelog CRUD 接口。
更新日志页面优先展示数据库数据，当记录为空时自动回退 i18n 文案。
内置编辑器支持切换语言、重置草稿并即时发布。
summary: 管理员现在可以在应用内直接发布版本更新说明。
title: 后台更新日志管理上线

items: Added a protected /api/changelog CRUD API guarded by JWT admin claims.
Logs page renders data from the database with i18n fallback when empty.
Inline editor supports locale switching, draft reset, and immediate publishing.
summary: Admins can now publish release notes directly inside the app.
title: Admin changelog management live

items: 新增帮助中心，覆盖快速上手、排障与支持渠道。
首次发布应用内更新日志，梳理身份、后端与前端的主要改动。
增加全局页脚，展示 AB-IN 品牌、备案号与 CSDN 博客链接。
summary: 把新手指引与更新记录集中在客户端内浏览。
title: 应用内帮助与日志上线

items: Introduced a help center with quick start guidance, troubleshooting, and support links.
Published an in-app changelog outlining identity, backend, and front-end improvements.
Added a global footer with AB-IN branding, ICP license, and CSDN blog reference.
summary: Centralized onboarding knowledge and change tracking inside the app.
title: New help center & logs

items: Simply check 'Auto Translate' in the log editor to generate other languages with one click.
The backend will call the configured model (e.g., deepseek-chat or doubao-1-5-thinking-pro-250415).
After creation, both the original and translated versions will be displayed, with a toast indicating the number of translated entries.
summary: When creating update logs, supports automatic translation and simultaneous publishing of multilingual versions.
title: New Log Auto-Translation Capability

items: 在日志编辑器勾选“自动翻译”即可一键生成其他语言。
后端会调用配置好的模型（例如 deepseek-chat 或 doubao-1-5-thinking-pro-250415）。
创建成功后会同时显示原文和翻译版本，toast 会提示翻译条目数量。
summary: 在创建更新日志时，支持自动翻译并同步发布多语言版本。
title: 新增日志自动翻译能力

items: 新增自动保存提示，并在偏好模型被禁用时优雅回退并提示用户。
关键词建议接入 React Query 缓存与重试机制，提高请求稳定性。
统一界面玻璃拟态样式，暗色模式与亮色模式体验一致。
完善仪表盘与关键词洞察的多语言文案，保持数据卡片一致性。
summary: 持续优化创作流程与状态恢复能力。
title: Prompt 工作台体验升级

items: Introduced autosave feedback and graceful fallbacks when preferred models are disabled.
Hooked keyword suggestions into React Query with caching and retry behaviour.
Unified theme-aware layouts with refreshed glassmorphism styling across pages.
Delivered locale-aware copy updates for dashboard metrics and keyword insights.
summary: Improved authoring experience and state resilience.
title: Prompt workbench refinements

items: 新增基于 MODEL_CREDENTIAL_MASTER_KEY 的 AES-256-GCM 加密。
完善 /api/models 接口，可创建、更新、删除与测试模型凭据。
当模型被禁用或删除时，自动清空首选模型避免指向无效配置。
拓展模型启用/禁用节点的审计日志，方便后续追踪。
summary: 为 DeepSeek 接入提供加密存储保障。
title: 模型凭据保险库

items: Added AES-256-GCM encryption guarded by MODEL_CREDENTIAL_MASTER_KEY.
Expanded /api/models endpoints for create, update, delete, and connection tests.
Automatically resets preferred_model when a credential is disabled or removed.
Expanded audit logging hooks to capture model enable/disable lifecycle events.
summary: Secured DeepSeek integrations behind encrypted storage.
title: Model credential vault

items: 注册流程会发送一次性邮箱验证令牌，未验证账号无法登录。
验证码与验证接口返回剩余尝试次数与冷却时间，便于前端提示。
集成 Redis 限流器，并提供内存实现满足本地开发需求。
登录成功统一触发客户端 Toast，无论是桌面端还是浏览器。
summary: 强化注册与限流策略，保障账号安全。
title: 验证优先的登录链路

items: Registration now issues one-time email verification tokens before login is allowed.
Captcha and verification endpoints expose remaining attempts and retry-after hints.
Integrated Redis-backed limiters with in-memory fallbacks for development.
Hooked login success to unified toast messaging for desktop and web runtimes.
summary: Strengthened onboarding and rate limiting policies.
title: Verification-first auth flow

items: 启用带请求 ID 的结构化 Zap 日志，中间件贯穿 HTTP 全链路。
后端 logs 目录分离滚动日志文件，便于分析与归档。
在 backend_README 中补充日志级别与采样策略说明，指导上线部署。
summary: 为后续运维监控奠定日志与指标基础。
title: 可观测性基础搭建

items: Enabled structured Zap logging with request IDs threaded through the HTTP middleware.
Provisioned separate rotating log files under backend/logs for easier export and sharing.
Documented log levels and sampling strategy in backend_README to guide production rollout.
summary: Laid the foundation for observability across services.
title: Operational telemetry groundwork
